reviewText: Master Han Yuiling demonstrates his Miao Dao form from his Cloud Demon School on this VCD. The form is beautiful and fast. Master Han was 63 years old at the time this video was made and he displays great speed and agility. The form presented here is master Han's creation since his the head master of the Cloud Demon School. I really enjoyed it and it was fun and challenging to learn. Before you buy it make sure that your DVD player can play VCD format. I use a video game console to play dvd/blu-ray (PS3) and it won't play this format, instead I have to use my computer to watch it.
